articles.title: Golf With Your Friends purchased by Team17 — and new content is coming - Polygon
articles.description: Golf With Your Friends is a popular party game for players and streamers, and it looks like it will continue to see new content. Team17 has purchased the IP, and say that this weird, wild game of golf and grief is just getting started.
articles.content:
English publisher and developer Team17 has purchased the rights and assets for chaotic golf simulator Golf With Your Friends for £12 million, according to a report from GamesIndustry.biz.
